SEARCH
Package com.petition.platform.repositories

Interface SimplePetitionRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<SimplePetition,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<SimplePetition,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<SimplePetition,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<SimplePetition,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<SimplePetition,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<SimplePetition>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<SimplePetition,Long>
@Repository public interface SimplePetitionRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<SimplePetition,Long>
Repository interface for accessing and managing SimplePetition entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<SimplePetition> findById(UUID id)
      Retrieves a SimplePetition by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the SimplePetition to retrieve.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the SimplePetition with the specified ID, or empty if not found.

    • findByTitleContaining

      List<SimplePetition> findByTitleContaining(String title)
      Retrieves a list of SimplePetitions whose title contains the specified string.
      Parameters:
      title - the string to search for within petition titles.
      Returns:
      a list of SimplePetitions whose titles contain the specified string.

    • findByCreator

      List<SimplePetition> findByCreator(SimpleUser creator)
      Retrieves a list of SimplePetitions created by the specified SimpleUser.
      Parameters:
      creator - the SimpleUser who created the petitions.
      Returns:
      a list of SimplePetitions created by the specified SimpleUser.

    • findByCompany

      List<SimplePetition> findByCompany(CompanyUser company)
      Retrieves a list of SimplePetitions associated with the specified CompanyUser.
      Parameters:
      company - the CompanyUser associated with the petitions.
      Returns:
      a list of SimplePetitions associated with the specified CompanyUser.

    • findByCompanyAndCreatorOrderByValidUntilDesc

      List<SimplePetition> findByCompanyAndCreatorOrderByValidUntilDesc(CompanyUser companyUser, SimpleUser creator)
      Retrieves a list of SimplePetitions associated with the specified CompanyUser and ordered by their validUntil field in descending order.
      Parameters:
      companyUser - the CompanyUser associated with the petitions.
      creator - the SimpleUser who created the petitions.
      Returns:
      a list of SimplePetitions associated with the specified CompanyUser and ordered by their validUntil field in descending order.

    • findByTextContaining

      List<SimplePetition> findByTextContaining(String text)
      Retrieves a list of SimplePetitions whose text contains the specified string.
      Parameters:
      text - the string to search for within petition text.
      Returns:
      a list of SimplePetitions whose text contains the specified string.

    • findByCompanyUsernameContaining

      List<SimplePetition> findByCompanyUsernameContaining(String name)
      Retrieves a list of SimplePetitions associated with a CompanyUser whose username contains the specified string.
      Parameters:
      name - the string to search for within company usernames.
      Returns:
      a list of SimplePetitions associated with a CompanyUser whose username contains the specified string.
